news_header: Atria reports improved financial performance in July-September.
news_text: Atria's adjusted operating profit for the July-September period was approximately EUR 26 million, up from just over EUR 19 million the previous year. The company anticipates further improvement, expecting to exceed an operating profit of 50 million from last year. CEO Kai Gyllström noted that the company has already surpassed the adjusted operating profit in three quarters. Net sales reached 439 million, showing slight growth compared to the same period last year.
